ERGA post-assembly QC

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [ERGA post-assembly QC](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/assembly/tutorials/ERGA-post-assembly-QC/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
* Includes a [Galaxy Workflow Report](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/galaxy/workflows_report_view.html)
